IP_SYN_3_style_9:
DIAGNOSIS: Stent blockage.
PROCEDURE: Rigid endoscopy for prosthesis retrieval and cryo-ablation.
DETAILS: We accessed the airway and confirmed tissue overgrowth. The Y-prosthesis was gripped and withdrawn using the rigid tube. We then applied freezing energy to the tissue obstructing the left bronchus to clear the passage. The patient recovered without incident.
